ill give u the random code for the donator points aquired.

There are tutorials in the tutorial section about adding points.

item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

[quote=“stefano1911, post:2, topic:407478”]i dont know why u use //
not gonna work with that lol

google it alot of tutorials[/quote]
“//” comments something out. Remove all the slashes in front of that code. Then it will work.

item.title: [PI] How do i add Donor points and.... [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Joshy426 Joshy426
item.description:
@Joshy426 wrote:

hey guys i would like to know how to make it so people can get donor points for donating and i would like to make a shop for that, also i have a donor zone but when donors use ::donorzone it wont tele them the code for that is//if (playerCommand.equals("donorzone") && c.memberStatus >= 2) { //if (c.inWild()) //return; //c.getPA().movePlayer(3053, 9577, 0); //c.sendMessage("Welcome to the Donator zone."); //} Also i would like to make it so when people get a kill they will get a certain amount of pk points like 10-250 pk points a kill (Because i made my items expensive) Please help, My MSN is zeldatutman@hotmail.com or PM me or comment if you could help me with teamviewer that would be great, Thanks,

By,
Joshy426
